column1: Quote
The better I get to know men, the more I find myself loving dogs.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.
The world would be a nicer place if everyone had the ability to love as unconditionally as a dog.
Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.
Happiness is a warm puppy.
The greatest pleasure of a dog is that you may make a fool of yourself with him and not only will he not scold you, but he will make a fool of himself too.
Dogs have a way of finding the people who need them, and filling an emptiness we didn't ever know we had.
My fashion philosophy is, if you're not covered in dog hair, your life is empty.
Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.
The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.
Dogs never bite me. Just humans.
A dog will teach you unconditional love. If you can have that in your life, things won't be too bad.
Dogs are our link to paradise. They don't know evil or jealousy or discontent.
The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
I think dogs are the most amazing creatures; they give unconditional love.
If there are no dogs in Heaven, then when I die I want to go where they went.
A dog is the only thing that can mend a crack in your broken heart.
Dogs leave paw prints on our hearts.
No matter how little money and how few possessions you own, having a dog makes you rich.
Every dog must have his day.
Dogs are wise. They crawl away into a quiet corner and lick their wounds and do not rejoin the world until they are whole once more.
The bond with a true dog is as lasting as the ties of this earth will ever be.
A dog can't think that much about what he's doing, he just does what feels right.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
The greatest fear dogs know is the fear that you will not come back when you go out the door without them.
Dogs are our best friends because they never judge us and always forgive us.
In a perfect world, every dog would have a home and every home would have a dog.
Dogs have given us their absolute all. We are the center of their universe.
The more people I meet, the more I love my dog.
Dogs are like potato chips; you can't have just one.
If you think dogs can't count, try putting three dog biscuits in your pocket and then give him only two.
A well-trained dog will make no attempt to share your lunch. He will just make you feel so guilty that you cannot eat it.
To his dog, every man is Napoleon; hence the constant popularity of dogs.
I've seen a look in dogs' eyes, a quickly vanishing look of amazed contempt, and I am convinced that basically dogs think humans are nuts.
Dogs are miracles with paws.
The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven, not man's.
Dogs do speak, but only to those who know how to listen.
A house is not a home without a dog.
Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
Be the person your dog thinks you are.
Dogs come into our lives to teach us about love and loyalty.
A dog's love is unconditional, a dog's loyalty is unwavering.
Life is better with a dog by your side.
Dogs make every day better just by being in it.
The love of a dog is a pure thing. He gives you a trust which is total.
Dogs are not just pets; they are family.
A dog will always be there for you, no matter what.
Dogs teach us the meaning of unconditional love.
In the eyes of a dog, you are everything.
